name: Mark of Rogues
description:
Sneak your way through dangerous cities to steal crucial documents!

Multiple weapons, spaceships, and more to be explored.

This is my third game jam, and is probably my most ambitious one. I did get a bit lazy in the last week so I didn't get to finish everything in my scope, but there is a game. Any feedback would be appreciated! I may turn this into some mobile game eventually.

Unfortunately there is no WebGL this time, I kept getting random errors for no reason that I couldn't fix
